word_mean: 叶状体：未分化为根、茎、叶的简单植物体，为有菌丝霉菌和某些藻类的特征
叶状植物：生长活跃的营养期生物体，区别于其生殖或静止部分，如霉菌
又称“原植体”。无真正根、茎、叶分化的植物体。

sentence.Network_en: Most thallus plants are currently classified as complex protists.
sentence.Network_cn: 大部分的原植体现在被归属为复杂的原生生物.

sentence.Network_en: Forming hormogonium is a main reproductive way of Nostoc flagelliforme by thallus.
sentence.Network_cn: 形成藻殖段是发菜原植体繁殖的主要方式.

means.word_mean: 1. a plant body without true stems or roots or leaves or vascular system; characteristic of the thallophytes
